text: Osian Gwynn Ellis CBE (8 February 1928 â€“ 6 January 2021) was a Welsh harpist and composer. He was known as the first harpist of the Melos Ensemble and for his musical works with Benjamin Britten. He was born in Ffynnongroyw, Flintshire, Wales. Ellis died on 6 January 2021, aged 92. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Welsh musicians Category:20th-century British composers Category:People from Flintshire
title: Osian Ellis
